scenes.background: [Bob] raises an eyebrow as [Monica] mentions improving communication for urgent tasks.
scenes.description: Monica taps her pen on the table. 'Improving communication is fine, but what about the workload? Can we rely on you in the future?'

options.text: I believe we can find a balance. Let's discuss distributing tasks more evenly.

options.text: I understand your concern. I'll make sure to be more available in future urgent situations.

options.text: I see the issue. Perhaps we can hire additional help for peak times.
